[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContractState.cs] [State: NftProtocolMap + NftInfoMap] [Supply Tracking] Can NftProtocolMap.Supply and sum of NftInfoMap quantities diverge? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContractState.cs] [State: NFTTypes + NFTTypeShortNameMap] [Type Sync] Can NFTTypes and NFTTypeShortNameMap become out of sync during add/remove operations? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContractState.cs] [State: All Maps] [Reentrancy] Are all state variable modifications in NFTContractState atomic and protected against reentrancy attacks? (Critical)
[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContractState.cs] [State: All Maps] [State Rollback] Can partial state updates be rolled back inconsistently, leaving contract in corrupted state? (High)
[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContractState.cs] [State: All Maps] [Storage Exhaustion] Can attackers fill unlimited entries in state maps to exhaust contract storage? (High)
[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContractState.cs] [State: All Maps] [Key Generation] Are all state map keys generated securely to prevent collision or prediction attacks? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContractState.cs] [State: All Maps] [Null Value Handling] Are null or default values in state maps handled consistently across all operations? (Medium)
[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContractState.cs] [State: All Maps] [Concurrent Access] Can concurrent transactions cause race conditions in state variable updates? (High)
[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContractState.cs] [State: All Maps] [Gas Optimization] Can large state maps cause excessive gas consumption, leading to DOS? (Medium)
[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContractState.cs] [State: All Maps] [Deletion Logic] Are state map entries properly cleaned up when no longer needed, or can they accumulate? (Medium)
[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContractState.cs] [State: All Variables] [Type Safety] Are all state variable types properly validated to prevent type confusion attacks? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContractState.cs] [State: NftInfoMap] [Token ID Uniqueness] Can token ID reuse logic in NftInfoMap cause overwriting of existing token data when IsTokenIdReuse is true? (High)
[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContractState.cs] [State: BalanceMap] [Transfer Atomicity] Are transfer operations on BalanceMap atomic to prevent partial transfers during failures? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContractState.cs] [State: NftProtocolMap] [Protocol Deletion] Can protocols be deleted from NftProtocolMap while tokens still exist, orphaning NFTs? (High)
